com.ibm.util.merge.template.content

Class BookmarkSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.template.content.Segment
      • com.ibm.util.merge.template.content.BookmarkSegment

  • public class BookmarkSegment
extends Segment
    Represents a Bookmark Segment within the Content

    Bookmarks are wrapped strings that start with "bookmark" and conform to this pattern

    bookmark = "name" group = "group" template = "template" varyby = "varyBy Attribute"

    All fields are required except the varyby field

    See the Insert directive for details on how Book Marks are used

    Author:
    Mike Storey
